src:
Obavljen žreb za ATP finale: Novak u grupi sa Federerom
05 Nov 2019, 15:12 by Zile
Obavljen je žreb za ATP finale u Londonu.
Novak Đoković će igrati u grupi „Bjorn Borg“, a rivali će mu biti Rodžer Federer, Dominik Tim i Mateo Beretini.
U grupi „Andre Agasi“ nalaze se Rafael Nadal, Danil Medvedev, Aleksandar Zverev i Stefanos Cicipas, a ukoliko se Nadal povuče zbog povrede prvi na listi čekanja je Roberto Bautista-Agut.
Đoković će prvog dana turnira, u nedelju 10. novembra, igrati protiv Beretinija, kao i Federer protiv Tima, dok će druga grupa u akciju u ponedeljak mečevima Cicipas – Medvedev i Nadal – Zverev.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
ATP Finals Draw Completed: Novice in Group with Federer
05 Nov 2019, 15:12 by Zile
A draw was made for the ATP Finals in London.
Novak Djokovic will play in the Bjorn Borg group, with rivals Roger Federer, Dominic Tim and Mateo Beretini.
The Andre Agasi group includes Rafael Nadal, Danil Medvedev, Alexander Zverev and Stefanos Cicipas, and if Nadal retires due to injury, Roberto Bautista-Agut is the first on the waiting list.
Djokovic will play against Beretini as well as Federer against Tim on the first day of the tournament on Sunday 10 November, while the other group will take action on Monday with Cicipas - Medvedev and Nadal - Zverev matches.
